articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: All Of Sony’s PlayStation 5 Models, Including The ‘Pro’ Version, Are Discounted By Up To 25 Percent For Amazon Black Friday 2024 - Wccftech
articles.description: Amazon Black Friday 2024 sale has all three of Sony’s PlayStation 5 consoles listed and has slashed their prices by up to 25 percent
articles.content: The launch of the PlayStation 5 Pro officially means that Sony has not two but three current-generation consoles added to its lineup, and if you have yet to upgrade and try out some of the best exclu… [+1559 chars]
